FuncDef: This command specifies the enqueuing forwarding class that should be associated with traffic matching the associate static route. If this parameter is not specified, the packet will use the forwarding-class association based on default classification or other QoS Policy associations.

ParaDef.Info: The forwarding class must be one of the pre-defined system forwarding classes. Values-be, l2, af, l1, h2, ef, h1, nc.
